# Z-Flow - Engineering Studio Berlin
# MVPs, Automation & AI Integration

## About
Z-Flow is an engineering studio based in Berlin, Germany. We build MVPs, automate business processes, and integrate AI solutions for startups and SMEs. Founded by Mahmoud Sheikh Alard.

## Services

### MVP Development
Web applications built with Next.js/React or No-Code tools (WeWeb). Backend powered by Xano or Supabase. Includes responsive design, user authentication, deployment, and after-launch support.
- Timeline: 2-6 weeks
- Starting price: €15,000

### Process Automation
Workflow automation using n8n or Make.com. We analyze your processes, build automated workflows, set up integrations, and provide documentation and training.
- Timeline: 1-3 weeks
- Starting price: €3,000

### AI Integration
Integrate AI capabilities into existing systems. We help businesses leverage AI for customer support, content generation, data processing, and more.

### Training
Hands-on workshops tailored to your use case. Learn to build and maintain solutions yourself using n8n, Make.com, or the No-Code stack. Remote or on-site available.
- Duration: Half-day to multi-day
- Starting price: €1,500

### Retainer
Ongoing development and maintenance partnership. Dedicated development time, priority support, regular updates, and feature development.
- Starting price: €4,000/month

## Tech Stack
- Automation: n8n, Make.com
- Frontend: Next.js, React, WeWeb (No-Code)
- Backend: Xano, Supabase
- Database: Supabase, Airtable, PostgreSQL
- AI: Claude, OpenAI, 11Labs
- Deployment: Vercel
